How do you even manage to be this patient with someone like me!? ğŸ˜­ 
I mean I know how irritating I behave at times ğŸ˜­ but you still bear with it and not just that you try to understand the reason behind my behaviour, you try to fix it and all of that shows how genuine your feelings are for me. ğŸ¥º 

Thank you Umair, for trying for me ğŸ¥ºğŸ©·

I mean I know how irritating I behave at times ğŸ˜­ but you still bear with it and not just that you try to understand the reason behind my behaviour, you try to fix it and all of that shows how genuine your feelings are for me. ğŸ¥º
